channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The 1% Club for Soccer Aid
channel.desc: Lee Mack hosts a Soccer Aid special of the quiz as 100 sports stars and celebrities compete to see if they can answer a question only one per cent of Britain got right.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: UEFA Nations League Final
channel.desc: Mark Pougatch presents coverage of the 2025 UEFA Men's Nations League Final - Karen Carney and Guillem Balague provide analysis while Seb Hutchinson and Andros Townsend commentate.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world.
